item.title: How Long Can You Go Without Eating?
item.description: Lately I have had more control over my schedule. I wanted to experiment with alternative diets and wanted to test going on a week long fast. I was able to make it about 6 days* without meals before I caved in. There are some studies that show that fasting improves mental focus and energy. I had previously participated in the 16⁄8 fast, where a participant eats in 8 hour windows and fasts for the rest.
